bio:
After Fengxian Zhang obtained her Master of Science in Biochemistry and Molecular biology, she pursued a Ph.D at the University of Queensland.  The next year, she moved to New York to do a joint program at NYU and  finished her Ph.D there.  

Research Interests:

Chromosome segregation and mitosis

Education:

Ph.D University of Queensland, 2015

Languages:

Chinese and English
